turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good day, Assistant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hey there, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please I need you to help me place some order from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, i can help with that. what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please, I need four pieces of medium pizza with thin crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can add some toppings of chicken barbecue. I don't mind.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: looks like bella luna is sold out of bbq chicken today. would you like something else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. Veggie Lovers, how about that?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want all 4 pizzas to be veggie lovers?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I need it the same same.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, give me a preview of my order, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want 4 medium pizzas with thin crust, all veggie lovers.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Exactly what I picked.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for this is is $65.45.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please. Place it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: should i place the order now?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, i've placed the order. it'll b ready for pick up in 35 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all for now. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome, take care.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.
